article_title: Harvest The Colorful Bounty At Babylonstoren, South Africa

article_metadata.description: FRANSCHOEKK, South Africa – Fresh flowers, grapes, olives, and plum blossoms. Cherry tomatoes paired with fresh watermelon. Cantaloupes and peaches accompanying pumpkin slices and millet. Fathom contributor Paula de la Cruz takes in the colorful bounty at Babylonstoren.
